post.body: Thanks for the tips! I'm convening one course per semester, so I won't be overloaded. I'm really looking forward to it. :)
Thanks for the free in melbourne tips! :)
I'm sorry I swore at you in my dream. But you *were* the last person holding me up from stopping the zombie apocalypse.
I know your pain. I suggest a compromise. You can come in, but you'll have to leave the wet dog smell outside. :)
and anyone else who wants to look at cute puppy pix: http://tinyurl.com/6jvryr :D
Lots of job WIN for me this week. And my puppy passed Puppy Preschool when I thought he'd flunk for being rowdy. :)
ACMA wants me to change my settings to accept cookies before it will show me its job ad. HA!
OMG you're detoxing from caffeine? *sympathy*
I have maple sugar and oatmeal scones in the oven. Life is good. :)
Looking at funding options for the website I want to build. I think I need to level up in grant application writing. :)
New blog post: Iâ€™m teaching at the University of Melbourne this year. :) http://tinyurl.com/9rkqak
New blog post: Free in Melbourne http://tinyurl.com/9xvvpg
RT @jayrosen_nyu: Some remarkably savvy, well informed and spirited advice for young journalists from a peer, Suzanne Yada http://is.gd/ekJB
Hai Twitter! I'm back from Tasmania and the Woodford Folk Festival. :)
Trying valiantly to finish off the Zombie Project That Would Not Die.
Bah, Melbourne's turned on terrible weather for the MTUB picnic and Larvatus Prodeo drinks. Think I'll be staying in today.
I just joined the aussietwitters Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/aussietwitters and you can too. Please Retweet.
Feeling grateful for how helpful all my various online communities are. And lately, Twitter's been my most helpful comm. Thanks! <3
Hallo twitter! Happy Friday! I hope everyone had as week as good as mine's been. :)
Heading to Belgian Beer Cafe on St Kilda Rd for the Girl Geek Dinner group end of year drinkies. http://tinyurl.com/5p48x5
